description: This table contains items related to Patient Communication Preferences.

columns.name: PREFERENCES_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the subject name record.

columns.name: APPT_REMDR_OFFSET_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column stores the offset of time prior to the appointment time when the system should send out a quick reminder.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


1 hour


2 hours


3 hours


4 hours


5 hours


6 hours


7 hours


8 hours


9 hours


10 hours


11 hours


0.5 days


1 day


2 days

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Scheduled Appointment Notifications.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_CHANGED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Changed Appointment Notifications.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_CANCELED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether the patient accepts Cadence Cancelled Appointment Notifications.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN

columns.name: APPT_NOTIF_MISSED_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a Yes No category value indicating whether or not a patient accepts Cadence Missed Appointment Notifications.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN

columns.name: USE_DAILY_DIGEST_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether a user wants to receive To Do task notifications only once daily.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DAILY_DIGEST_TM
columns.description: The time at which the user wants to receive once daily To Do task reminder notifications.

columns.name: AUTO_ADD_TO_WAITLIST_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether an appointment will be automatically added to the Wait List upon scheduling based on the patient preference. 'Y' indicates that the appointment is auto-added when scheduling if the DEP/SDF settings allow for it. 'N' or NULL indicate that the appointment will not be auto-added.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN

columns.name: RSLT_DAILY_DIGEST_YN
columns.description:
This item stores whether the user has signed up to receive a Daily Digest tickler for test results.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: APPT_NOTIF_SCHEDULED_YN
